verses.verse: Now after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> Moses' <S%H4872><s%> minister, <S%H8334><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> is dead; <S%H4191><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore arise, <S%H6965><s%> go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> do give <S%H5414><s%> to them, even to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> shall tread <S%H1869><s%> upon, that have I given <S%H5414><s%> unto you, as <S%H834><s%> I said <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

From the wilderness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4057><s%> and this <S%H2088><s%> Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates, <S%H6578><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and unto <S%H5704><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> toward the going down <S%H3996><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> your coast. <S%H1366><s%>

There shall not <S%H3808><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life: <S%H2416><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I was <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so I will be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee: I will not <S%H3808><s%> fail <S%H7503><s%> thee, nor <S%H3808><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> thee.

Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of a good courage: <S%H553><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> unto <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> shalt thou <S%H859><s%> divide for an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them.

Only <S%H7535><s%> be thou strong <S%H2388><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> courageous, <S%H553><s%> that thou mayest observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the law, <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee: turn <S%H5493><s%> not <S%H408><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> it to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left, <S%H8040><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest prosper <S%H7919><s%> whithersoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou goest. <S%H1980><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> depart <S%H4185><s%> out of thy mouth; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6310><s%> but thou shalt meditate <S%H1897><s%> therein day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> therein: for <S%H3588><s%> then <S%H227><s%> thou shalt make <S%H6743><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy way <S%H1870><s%> prosperous, <S%H6743><s%> and then <S%H227><s%> thou shalt have good success. <S%H7919><s%>

Have not <S%H3808><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee? Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of a good courage; <S%H553><s%> be not afraid, <S%H6206><s%> <S%H408><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> be thou dismayed: <S%H2865><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is with <S%H5973><s%> thee whithersoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou goest. <S%H1980><s%>
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the host, <S%H4264><s%> and command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Prepare <S%H3559><s%> you victuals; <S%H6720><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> within <S%H5750><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> to go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> you to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

And to the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and to half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given you rest, <S%H5117><s%> and hath given <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

Your wives, <S%H802><s%> your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and your cattle, <S%H4735><s%> shall remain <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> but ye <S%H859><s%> shall pass <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> armed, <S%H2571><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> and help <S%H5826><s%> them;

Until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have given <S%H5117><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> rest, <S%H5117><s%> as he hath given you, and they <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> have possessed <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> them: then ye shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession, <S%H3425><s%> and enjoy <S%H3423><s%> it, which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrising. <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%>

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou commandest <S%H6680><s%> us we will do, <S%H6213><s%> and whithersoever <S%H413><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou sendest <S%H7971><s%> us, we will go. <S%H1980><s%>

According as we hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> things, <S%H834><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will we hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee: only <S%H7535><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee, as <S%H834><s%> he was <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Whosoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> he be that doth rebel against <S%H4784><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy commandment, <S%H6310><s%> and will not <S%H3808><s%> hearken unto <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou commandest <S%H6680><s%> him, he shall be put to death: <S%H4191><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of a good courage. <S%H553><s%>
